yacl3.config.faster_climbing:config.enab: The speed at which you climb the ladder now changes depending on your viewpoint orientation when you're on the ladder.
Whether to enable faster upward laddering.
Whether to enable faster downward laddering.
yacl3.config.faster_climbing:config.spee: Speed multiplier, multiplied by the angle sin value, 2.0 corresponds to 30 degrees for the original speed.
